diff_hunk:
@@ -22,7 +22,7 @@ def forward(self, input):
         self.scale = self.scale or input.new()
         output = input.new()
 
-        backend = type2backend.get(type(input))
+        backend = type2backend[type(input)]
body: `.get` no longer works because type2backed is a `Backends` object. Even though `CrossMapLRN2d` is not implemented for CUDA, `backend` will still not be `None`. I think we need to fix the checks below to see if `hasattr(backend, 'SpatialCrossMapLRN_updateOutput')`
